org.omnifaces.viewhandler

Class NoAutoGeneratedIdViewHandler.NoAutoGeneratedIdResponseWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • javax.faces.context.ResponseWriter
        • javax.faces.context.ResponseWriterWrapper
          • org.omnifaces.viewhandler.NoAutoGeneratedIdViewHandler.NoAutoGeneratedIdResponseWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, javax.faces.FacesWrapper<javax.faces.context.ResponseWriter>
    Enclosing class:
    NoAutoGeneratedIdViewHandler

    public static class NoAutoGeneratedIdViewHandler.NoAutoGeneratedIdResponseWriter
extends javax.faces.context.ResponseWriterWrapper
    This response writer throws an IllegalStateException when an attribute with name "id" is written with a non-null value which starts with UIViewRoot.UNIQUE_ID_PREFIX or contains an intermediate.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Arjan Tijms
